scripts.gen: npm run build && node dist/index.js gen --papers_dir /home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books --output db.json
scripts.gen_arXiv: npm run build && node dist/index.js gen --papers_dir arXivPDFs --output db_arXiv.json
scripts.gen_all: npm run build && node dist/index.js gen --only_append --papers_dir /home/akira/Dropbox/papers/ --output db_all.json --book_dirs /home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/LinuxDeviceDrivers_ThirdEdition/,/home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/BasicCategoryTheoryForComputerScientists/,/home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/LecturesOnTheCurry-HowardIsomorphism/,/home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/LinuxDeviceDrivers_ThirdEdition/,/home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/TypesAndProgrammingLanguages/
scripts.gen_all_from_scratch: npm run build && node dist/index.js gen --papers_dir /home/akira/Dropbox/papers/ --output db_all.json --book_dirs /home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/LinuxDeviceDrivers_ThirdEdition/,/home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/BasicCategoryTheoryForComputerScientists/,/home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/LecturesOnTheCurry-HowardIsomorphism/,/home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/LinuxDeviceDrivers_ThirdEdition/,/home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/TypesAndProgrammingLanguages/
scripts.gen_linux: npm run build && node dist/index.js gen --papers_dir /home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/LinuxDeviceDrivers_ThirdEdition/ --output db_book.json --book_dirs /home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/LinuxDeviceDrivers_ThirdEdition/
scripts.gen_tapl: npm run build && node dist/index.js gen --papers_dir /home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/TypesAndProgrammingLanguages --output db_tapl.json --book_dirs /home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/TypesAndProgrammingLanguages/
scripts.gen_lchi: npm run build && node dist/index.js gen --papers_dir /home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/LecturesOnTheCurry-HowardIsomorphism --output db_lchi.json --book_dirs /home/akira/Dropbox/papers/books/LecturesOnTheCurry-HowardIsomorphism/
scripts.server: npm run build && node dist/index.js server --db db.json
scripts.server_all: npm run build && node dist/index.js server --db db_all.json
scripts.run_test_server: npm run build && node dist/index.js gen --papers_dir test_pdfs && node dist/index.js server --db test_pdfs/db.json
scripts.server_tapl: npm run build && node dist/index.js server --db db_tapl.json
